overview_of_class: The goal of this course is to further enhance students' Chinese proficiency by systematically exposing them to texts in different contexts and culture in contemporary China. Theme-based instruction is applied and a variety of authentic materials are used in this course.
name: Chinese V: Special Topics in Advanced Chinese
title: WCAS CHINESE 320-0-20 Chinese V: Special Topics in Advanced Chinese
topic: Social and Cultural Issues in Contemporary China

descriptions.value: The goal of this course is to further enhance students' Chinese proficiency by systematically exposing them to texts in different contexts and culture in contemporary China. Theme-based instruction is applied and a variety of authentic materials are used in this course.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Minimum two quarters of 311 or 312 or 315 or 322 or by placement.

descriptions.value: Participation in class, essays, oral presentations
